roleset.name: to purify

example.name: passive
example.text: At the same time , moves toward tighter air-quality standards are spurring interest in lighter or alternative fuels that [] do n't pollute as much as fuel-1 refined [*]-1 from `` heavy '' crudes , generally high in sulfur .

example.name: transitive
example.text: ERC International Inc. , which [] provides professional and technical services to the military , is refining its defense niche , not retreating from it .

example.text: artistic aesthetic is something that emerges through long years of stylistic refinement and expression.
